header.topics: food, friends, catch-up, ex-boyfriends, family, work, health, future plans
header.conv_type: discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, announcing, anecdote telling, making arrangements

oh your drugs? you pharmaceutical company

okay so tell me all about you and how are you and doing?
mm good it was really good to go away and to have some time and some space that wasn't in or
that was nice cos we we'd only really been seen each other maybe and we did manage to it might have been once a week but it was only like one day
so there's that kind of you know but yeah no everything's good things are good like his family are now giving me books to read

so they're all just lovely so

don yeah don't ask erm he moved in with her

he did he dumped her he told her he didn't love her anymore and didn't wanna be with her
I know despite the fact that she was like come from Australia to be with him and and they'd just moved in together and yeah bit messy
so what was the message? hey I've broken up with my girlfriend just thought you should know?
mm well no not well kind of like me and him like obviously we talk like we're friends and then
like before my birthday the week before my birthday we had a conversation cos I went out and got absolutely hammered by accident ended up on my own on the floor outside HSBC throwing my guts out
were you just out and it was ?

yeah I was fine and then suddenly it just hit me and I don't actually know how I even got home I don't know very much really erm but I called everybody like I was calling my par like I called everybody on my phone and I called him by accident and he must have picked up so I'm like he like and then the next day sent me a message like oh he was really worried about you like and I was like shit sorry I I don't remember I I called everybody I my phone it's ridiculous I had messages from everybody being like where are you? are you in hospital? like please get i please contact us like it was horrendous and he's like
erm and he was like well it's fine but my girlfriend didn't think it was very appropriate and I was like no I completely understand that's perfectly fine

like having your ex girlfriend call you at like two in the morning hung drunk is not I I completely get that and he was like and it's rea and I was like but no offence don't tell me that my me calling you was inappropriate compared to some of the messages

thank you very much and he was like yeah okay I get that erm and then and he said well she just doesn't really want us to talk very much anymore and I was like okay that's fine you know she's compl she's come over from Australia to be with you I don't wanna ruin that you know if she's if she doesn't like me talking to you let's just you know stop talking then so that carried on and then a week later on my birthday he sent me a message at half past ten at night er you know I'd just got back from Barcelona I was really happy got a message from him saying erm happy birthday I hope you had the most amazing day just wanted to message you even though we're not supposed to be talking but I just want you to know that I still really care and I was like oh great thanks just ruined my bir and then the cheek of it the end of it was like please don't reply to this message
no like first I'm not gonna reply not cos you told me not to reply but I'm just not gonna reply and erm and then I went up to erm Newcastle

for the run and he sent me messages being like I'm so proud of you you know this is amazing you've done something incredible you know like words can't describe how much I care for you and how important you are to me and I was like

yeah I was like dude no offence but you shouldn't be saying but you have a girlfriend and l and he was like I've made so many mistakes in my life I'm like no offence if you think your girlfriend is a mistake break up with her like it's not fair on her if you're acting like she's a mistake and he was like you will always be my Eskimo I'm like I'm not your Eskimo like we haven't been together for two years

what are you on about boy? he was just like oh okay and then a few days later he mess he I heard like nothing from him and then I just got a message from him on erm Hangout on Google Hangout saying erm yeah I can't text you cos I sai I broke up with my girlfriend and she keeps trying to contact me and I was like okay what do you want me to say to that? he says mm it's just been a bit ridiculous with him
you're the one that got away obviously

but he needs to chat to meet up

erm while working for the Daily erm not the Daily Mail the Royal Mail

yeah on November the second I will be single for two years like and he's still round every corner so
it's like I've always said you know if you are happy with the level of it and you can handle it it's fine but when it gets to the time when it's just like dude shut up right

I think maybe in a few years
maybe in the future but not now I like I I still really care about him
and I he means he means a lot to me

kind of thing that I'm only kind of projecting personal experience with the boy
when it was like you know iit's that kind of thing you keep talking to them and then you meet up with them and then it's like oh it's quite nice to hang out with them and that's how it often is

cos I think the weird thing you know at where it was like individual people

I think it's better than it was but from my department but there's been a restructure where editor and aren't editors and anymore they are content and learning specialists so they have the same job title yeah it's all a bit weird I don't I don't know much about it cos it only just got announced but basically they're kind of aligning everything
but we're just gonna be managing everyone everyone and ETLs are gonna become scrum masters matters but we're not quite sure what they're doing

so maybe she's still doing the same editorial role basically?
oh yeah they just don't call it that
they just call it something different yeah
exactly so it's kind of like well it's like product management which has some weight in other industries content and learning specialist?

that in any industry apparently they spent a year and half trying to figure out that but yeah so I think everybody everybody in those camps are kind of like you know they've just taken that on board erm I think some of the reactions have been positive I know that

cos it's just been real they've just got all the pressure on them at the moment over this erm and there's a lot of tension between editors and it's been like well some of you aren't pulling your weight cos you're not doing more than the nine to five kind of thing it's like er

you know yeah but erm I think was in a really difficult position cos they were like arguing about the schedules and leeway but we couldn't have leeway and so yeah but I helped make the sched she didn't say it but she was like I helped make those schedules I know why they're that way from a positive perspective I can see where the publishers are coming from and it's like
but erm like marketing is better now that the restructure has actually been announced it's a bit

you know that was just a bit sorry for me it's just I feel a lot better doing the job that I'm doing
I loved the job that I was doing before with science in terms of the people that I was working with
that was awesome the kind of work that we were being asked to do was just like it's not

that's just not good erm and with history I know more about it which is good and I have a bit more control over what I'm doing and you know and they seem to really like the stuff that I'm doing so far like within the first few weeks for the first week I'd been given like a brochure and it was like oh yeah it it it just needs updating so I've already er got all the copy together you just need to put it into the this was from somebody who was kind of just looking after me for a little while I looked at it and went no that's shite that is a load of shite rewrote it within the first couple of days like the head of like project management going to the science team going gosh I know you told me that she was good but I didn't know she was quite this good
you know so sad and the science team was just like we hate this come back please we miss you
but you know I think that's the thing if I'd had a job where I was working with people I think I'd be alright like

as in any of the choices that I made I would choose to do a less demanding job
